A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The SW franchise needed this movie and update. Of course the force doesn't belong to anyone. It belongs to everyone. I love the thought that everyone in the SW universe has a place and part in their fight either with or against two extremes good and evil. In the end you need both to bring balance. So while this was a fresh update it also stayed true to the original films. Everyone who is hating on it will NEVER be happy. So I'll continue ignoring the haters.
